title: Schedule of implementation
context: ยง37-78 Schedule of implementation. The governor shall submit to the legislature: (1) At the regular session of 1975, and every odd-numbered year&rsquo;s session thereafter, the program memoranda described in section 37-70. (2) At the regular session of 1975, and every odd-numbered year&rsquo;s session thereafter, the governor&rsquo;s proposed state budget and six-year program and financial plan.
